Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Limits the amount such fine to be paid for violating the E-ZPass system for failing to pay a toll
Summary: Limits the amount of the fine to be paid for violating the E-ZPass system for failing to pay a toll to not exceed the amount of such unpaid toll.
LawCode: Add ยง354-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to limiting the amount of the fine to be paid for violating the E-ZPass system
